## Path3D.getCurve() method

Returns the Path3D array of successive Vector3 designing its curve.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCurve(): Vector3[];
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector3[]`

the Path3D array of successive Vector3 designing its curve.
